article: As the big weekend approaches, my feelings about you and your marriage are personal and it's more _ to me that you realize how much I love you and how _ I am of the amazing woman you have become. My memory for details is terrible, _ my memory for how _ you were as a child is vivid. I loved tossing you _ books on the floor of the Denver book store with you on my knees. When I think of you as an adult, it is your _ that has led you to your vegetarian lifestyle. It is your heart that helps you care for family and friends in need . For these _ I have selected three hearts that are this dad's gift to his _ to marry daughter. One heart is a small golden box with a _ of you and me together. It will _ you that of the men in your life I loved you _ and will always love you forever and ever. The second heart is made of jade and has the Chinese character "Fu". Jade represents luck and "Fu" means _ . Maria and I want your life to be filled with _ . The third heart is just pretty and represents your _ , inside and _ kind. You are a wonderful, loving _ from God, a beautiful human being. So we are delighted that you are entering this exciting part of your life. Finally, the wedding will be amazing. I can't wait to see you walk down in your beautiful dress. And I can't wait to dance with you in _ . My hope is that the event and the whole weekend will bring _ memories. This from your devoted and proud...Dad
